title.value: ChatGPT vs LLaMA: Impact, Reliability, and Challenges in Stack Overflow Discussions
title.justification: The title of the paper is mentioned in the beginning.
title.quote: ChatGPT vs LLaMA: Impact, Reliability, and Challenges in Stack Overflow Discussions

extractions.description: Since its release in November 2022, ChatGPT has shaken up Stack Overflow, the premier platform for developers’ queries on programming and software development. Demonstrating an ability to generate instant, human-like responses to technical questions, ChatGPT has ignited debates within the developer community about the evolving role of human-driven platforms in the age of generative AI. Two months after ChatGPT’s release, Meta released its answer with its own Large Language Model (LLM) called LLaMA: the race was on. We conducted an empirical study analyzing questions from Stack Overflow and using these LLMs to address them. This way, we aim to ① measure user engagement evolution with Stack Overflow over time; ② quantify the reliability of LLMs’ answers and their potential to replace Stack Overflow in the long term; ③ identify and understand why LLMs fails; and ④ compare LLMs together. Our empirical results are unequivocal: ChatGPT and LLaMA challenge human expertise, yet do not outperform it for some domains, while a significant decline in user posting activity has been observed. Furthermore, we also discuss the impact of our findings regarding the usage and development of new LLMs.

type.justification: The paper is empirical as it conducts a study analyzing questions from Stack Overflow.
type.quote: We conducted an empirical study analyzing questions from Stack Overflow and using these LLMs to address them.

name.justification: The paper's primary focus is on the impact of LLMs on software development, as evidenced by its analysis of Stack Overflow, a platform for developers.
name.quote: Since its release in November 2022, ChatGPT has shaken up Stack Overflow, the premier platform for developers’ queries on programming and software development.

name.justification: ChatGPT is the name of the model.
name.quote: Since its release in November 2022, ChatGPT has shaken up Stack Overflow

is_contributed.justification: The paper does not contribute ChatGPT, it was developed by OpenAI.
is_contributed.quote: ChatGPT is a language model developed by OpenAI.

is_executed.justification: The paper uses ChatGPT to answer Stack Overflow questions, meaning it was executed.
is_executed.quote: We conducted an empirical study analyzing questions from Stack Overflow and using these LLMs to address them.

is_compared.justification: The paper compares ChatGPT to LLaMA in its ability to answer Stack Overflow questions.
is_compared.quote: Our empirical results are unequivocal: ChatGPT and LLaMA challenge human expertise, yet do not outperform it for some domains, while a significant decline in user posting activity has been observed.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The ChatGPT model itself is not introduced in a specific paper, but rather in a blog post.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Furthermore, with the release of ChatGPT2, publicly available for the general audience, users have prompted them for different purposes, like simulating a Q&A online web forum.

name.justification: LLaMA is the name of the model.
name.quote: Two months after ChatGPT’s release, Meta released its answer with its own Large Language Model (LLM) called LLaMA: the race was on.

is_contributed.justification: The paper does not contribute LLaMA, it was developed by Meta.
is_contributed.quote: LLaMA, released by Meta AI, is a series of large language models that come with different sizes (e.g., 7, 13, and 70 billion parameters for LLaMA-2) (Touvron et al., 2023).

is_executed.justification: The paper uses LLaMA to answer Stack Overflow questions, meaning it was executed.
is_executed.quote: We conducted an empirical study analyzing questions from Stack Overflow and using these LLMs to address them.

is_compared.justification: The paper compares LLaMA to ChatGPT in its ability to answer Stack Overflow questions.
is_compared.quote: Our empirical results are unequivocal: ChatGPT and LLaMA challenge human expertise, yet do not outperform it for some domains, while a significant decline in user posting activity has been observed.

referenced_paper_title.value: Llama 2: Open foundation and fine-tuned chat models
referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper references a paper when introducing LLaMA.
referenced_paper_title.quote: LLaMA, released by Meta AI, is a series of large language models that come with different sizes (e.g., 7, 13, and 70 billion parameters for LLaMA-2) (Touvron et al., 2023).
